meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be chewed easily.
meanings.sent1: The chewiness of the bread made it enjoyable to eat.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the chewiness of steak over the tenderness of fish.
meanings.sent3: The chewiness of the gum lasted longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: The chewiness of the caramel reminded me of taffy.
meanings.sent5: The chewiness of the candy made it last longer in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The texture or consistency of food that requires chewing.
meanings.sent1: The chewiness of the steak made it satisfying to eat.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the chewiness of bagels in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The chewiness of the gummy bear made it fun to eat.
meanings.sent4: The chewiness of the rice cake surprised me.
meanings.sent5: The chewiness of the toffee made it hard to resist.
